title: Containables
resume: Jon and Kristen Meier think outside the box by building in it! Together they convert shipping containers into some of the most unique and charming homes imaginable. Working out of a 20,000-square-foot barn on their parents' farm in Needville, Texas, it's a family affair as everyone pitches in to bring these dream homes to life.
